tidbits.title: Remarkable Recovery
tidbits.description: Rwanda has made a remarkable recovery from the tragic genocide in 1994, focusing on reconciliation, justice, and economic growth, becoming an example of resilience and progress.

tidbits.title: Gorilla Conservation
tidbits.description: Home to the endangered mountain gorillas, Rwanda's conservation efforts in places like Volcanoes National Park have contributed significantly to their protection and revival.

tidbits.title: Green Initiative
tidbits.description: Rwanda is a pioneer in environmental sustainability, implementing a nationwide ban on plastic bags and promoting eco-friendly practices to preserve its breathtaking landscapes.
